summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of First Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-third Street to Pacific Place, and Pacific Place, from First Avenue Northeast to Second Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all wyes, openings, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewering and draining of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1339 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
